channel.title: Download Client Help![317]
channel.description: Ok I have a Client that i want to put on the internet for people to download. Like uppit.com or mediafire.com(not advertising) but what files do i add to an archive to put on the internet? I want it to be how they download my client and they can just click on it on there desktop and it pops up. I dont want it to whare they have to go through the folders like I do and can edit all the .java files. Help Please!!! making me frusterated :mad: :mad:

item.title: Download Client Help![317]
item.dc:creator: @Delift3d Delift3d
item.description:
@Delift3d wrote:

Ok I have a Client that i want to put on the internet for people to download. Like uppit.com or mediafire.com(not advertising) but what files do i add to an archive to put on the internet? I want it to be how they download my client and they can just click on it on there desktop and it pops up. I dont want it to whare they have to go through the folders like I do and can edit all the .java files. Help Please!!! making me frusterated :mad: :mad:
